title: If you do not nerf ekko to the ground, I'm gladly done with this cancer game
body:
It's not as much as it's broken as hell, which it is, by the way, but that the people who play him are truly the cancer. Insta locks with mid spam every blind or draft, if they don't get to play this broken piece of shit, they intentionally feed and of course rito will do nothing.

Nerf this filth to the ground and below or I'm honestly done after 4 years.

Oh no, people are acting like they act every time a new champion comes out. RIOT NERF BECAUSE THAT WILL STOP THIS FROM EVER HAPPENING AGAIN!

I've yet to have someone instant lock in Ekko in normals. I don't think I've even seen him in a single game of mine yet. I grabbed him because I have the IP and I refuse to not have all the champs available to me, but I've still just been playing Lux, I want that shiny Level 5 Mastery.

Honestly get over yourself. Every new champ or reworked champ is either OP or UP for the first week or so. Either because the PBE is a terrible testing ground for champion's balancing numbers, or because people are stupid and slow on how to learn a new champion.
Remember how Gnar and Azir were considered weak and useless upon release? But then people finally learned how to play them after two months.
